4.title: Steve Jobs | Biography, Education, Apple, & Facts | Britannica
4.description: Oct 29, 2020 — Steve Jobs was a charismatic pioneer of the personal computer era. With Steve Wozniak, Jobs founded Apple Inc. in 1976 and transformed the company into a world leader in telecommunications. Widely considered a visionary and a genius, he oversaw the launch of such revolutionary products as the iPod and the iPhone.Oct 29, 2020 — Steve Jobs was a charismatic pioneer of the personal computer era.
